page.title: 14GIANT'S CAUSEWAY SOUVENIRS
page.content: Mr. Daniel McConaghie has been {making souvenirs at the Giant's {Causeway}for thirty-five years. He makes blackthorn walking sticks called shillelaghs and from rock he makes musical cottages and wishing chairs. The type of rock he uses is{basalt or{lithmarge. }He gets this rock from the Causeway. He sells his souvenirs to the Tourist Kiosks at the Causeway. Most of the tourists come from England, Scotland and America to buy them. Mr. McConaghie started this job because after World War II souvenirs were hard to obtain. He has one man to help him in his job.
